saao/saa15/P334202
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}MAN-IGI.LAL-an-ni lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ DI-mu a-na {URU}bir-te i-su-ri LUGAL EN i-qa-bi ma-a mi₃-nu ṭe₃-mu ša DUMU-{1}NUMUN-i pa-nu-tu₂ iq-ṭi₂-bu-ni ma-a ina {KUR}pu-qu-di i-ta-lak u₂-ma-a u₂-sa-ni-ʾu-u iq-ṭi₂-bu-ni ma-a ina {URU}u₂-ru-uk šu-u {LU₂}A-KIN-ia {LU₂}A-KIN-ia ina {URU}sa-pi-a i-ta-lak ki-ma i-tal-ka mi₃-nu ša ṭe₃-mu-ni ba-te-iq-tu₂ a-na LUGAL EN-ia a-šap-par ŠA₃-bu ša LUGAL EN-ia a-dan-niš lu-u DUG₃.GA-šu₂ {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x bil-tu₂ x x x x x {URU}a-di-ni x x x x+x-i-lu i-ba-ši 50 ša il-li-ku-ni-ni E₂-MEŠ-šu₂-nu i-ra-ṣi-bu aq-ṭi₂-ba-šu₂-nu muk ia-mu-tu₂ E₂-su li-ir-ṣi-bi le-ru-bu ina E₂-šu₂ lu-še-bi
